mapper.select: SELECT id, username, display_name AS displayName, user_type AS userType, org_id AS orgId, status, auth_provider AS authProvider, password_hash AS passwordHash, password_algo AS passwordAlgo, password_updated_at AS passwordUpdatedAt, last_login_at AS lastLoginAt, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT 1
